title: Too much stats reporting

This is once per second reporting. I tend to disagree it is too much. I think it seems like we are chatty because this server has only two nodes connected. Let me know if that is, in fact, dosing the server but this would be rather a server issue.

Well, as long as we have four nodes, it's fine. But for a mainnet ethstats server, if every client reports every second, it will be overloaded. Geth sends every 15 secnonds, which IMO is more reasonalbe.
